name: Fire Imp
description: The Fire Imp is a tiny fiend known for its cunning nature, possessing red skin and fiery eyes. It is adept at avoiding damage and utilizes magical abilities for stealth and combat.
memorable: Its ability to absorb fire damage and simultaneously heal makes it a unique threat in battle.
goals: Using cunning tactics to deceive and outsmart opponents, while thriving in magical and combat situations.
relations: Often found serving more powerful fiends or in the company of other elemental creatures.
environment: Commonly found in fiery or infernal areas, often in service to demon lords or during magical duels.
strengths: Effective at manipulating fire, highly mobile, and possesses magic resistance.
weaknesses: Low physical strength and susceptible to certain types of magic.
attacks: Utilizes Fire Touch for melee attacks and Hurl Flame for ranged assaults, both dealing fire damage.
most_powerful_ability: Fire Absorption, which allows it to heal instead of taking fire damage.
senses: Possesses Devil's Sight enabling it to see in magical darkness.
skills: Proficient in deception and stealth, enhancing its ability to avoid detection and manipulate situations.
additional_information: Can cast Heat Metal once per day without using components.
Regenerates health from fire damage received.
Has advantage on saving throws against spells.
Ignores normal darkness due to Devil's Sight.
spellcasting: Capable of casting Heat Metal and exhibiting various magical abilities.
test_queries: quick flying imp that absorbs fire
deceptive fire creature that casts spells
cunning fiend that uses heat metal
fire imp with magical sight and resistance
